dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM/PowerHal/DDR voting issue as the root cause but did not explicitly mention 拉檔 (frequency throttling).

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The agent captured the CM causing VCORE increase but did not mention SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 voting mechanisms.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the VCORE 725mV usage at 29.32% but missed DDR percentages and specific CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and correctly rules out MMDVFS as a cause, but lacks detail on the CPU and DDR interactions.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: No historical fixes or recommendations were provided, limiting actionability.
